name: AccountTransactions
description: The AccountTransactions model is designed to track and manage all transactions associated with various accounts. Each transaction entry records critical details such as the source and destination accounts, transaction amount, timestamp, and specific transaction details tailored to the type of transaction (e.g., cryptocurrency or bank-related).

operations.name: CREATE_TRANSACTION
operations.description: Adds a new transaction to the account transactions state.

operations.name: UPDATE_TRANSACTION
operations.description: Updates an existing transaction in the account transactions state.

operations.name: DELETE_TRANSACTION
operations.description: Deletes a transaction from the account transactions state by its ID.

operations.name: UPDATE_TRANSACTION_BUDGET
operations.description: Updates the budget associated with a specific transaction.
